question: Who has been elected as the 95th Prime Minister of Japan?
explanation: Japanese lawmakers have reelected Shinzo Abe as the country\'s 95th Prime Minister on November 1, 2017 after his party won a landslide victory in last month\'s general election. Abe was reelected by both Houses of the Diet. The prime minister will now form his cabinet. Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has reappointed all of his Cabinet Ministers, following his reelection by the Diet as country\'s leader, to ensure continuity of his policies.
